summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Full Reporting System for Iteration 54. Backend: 32/32 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All features verified working - Generate Report tab, Schedules tab, History tab, Preview functionality, Create Schedule dialog.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: FilePdf icon import error - replaced with File icon from lucide-react
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed scheduled reports during testing (auto-cleaned)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 54 verified all Full Reporting System features. 7 report types available (revenue, orders, clients, leads, compliance, enablement, consent). 4 export formats (CSV, XLSX, PDF, JSON). Scheduled report delivery via email (requires valid POSTMARK_SERVER_TOKEN for actual email delivery).

backend_apis.GET /api/admin/reports/types: PASS - Returns 7 report types and 4 formats
backend_apis.GET /api/admin/reports/preview/{report_t: PASS - All 7 report types preview correctly
backend_apis.POST /api/admin/reports/schedules/{id}/r: PASS - Manual run works (email fails without valid POSTMARK token)

frontend_ui.stats_cards: PASS - 4 stats cards displayed (Report Types, Active Schedules, Reports Sent, Exports)
frontend_ui.generate_report_tab: PASS - Export Settings form with Report Type, Format, Period dropdowns
frontend_ui.preview_button: PASS - Preview loads data table with columns and rows
frontend_ui.download_button: PASS - Download triggers file download (verified via API)
frontend_ui.schedules_tab: PASS - Shows scheduled reports table and recent executions
frontend_ui.history_tab: PASS - Shows export history with Report ID, Type, Format, Rows, Period, Generated
frontend_ui.create_schedule_dialog: PASS - Dialog with Schedule Name, Report Type, Frequency, Format, Recipients, Enabled toggle

authentication.admin_required: PASS - All endpoints require admin authentication

report_types_verified: revenue - Revenue by orders and services

integrations_status.authentication: WORKING - Admin auth required for all admin endpoints
integrations_status.postmark: CONFIGURED - Email delivery requires valid POSTMARK_SERVER_TOKEN (currently using test token)

notes.email_delivery: Email delivery for scheduled reports uses Postmark. Without valid POSTMARK_SERVER_TOKEN, emails are logged but not sent. The 'Run Now' feature works but email delivery fails with invalid token.
notes.frontend_fix: Fixed FilePdf import error by replacing with File icon from lucide-react
